snippet: The American Realness dance festival, in its fourth year at the Abrons Arts Center, features works by Trajal Harrell and Keith Hennessy.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews opening performances for 2013 American Realness dance festival at Abrons Arts Center.
lead_paragraph: The American Realness dance festival, in its fourth year at the Abrons Arts Center, features works by Trajal Harrell and Keith Hennessy.

headline.seo: American Realness Festival at Abrons Arts Center
